name: Claws That Catch
text:
**Before the attack:** If enraged, you may move 1 space to a space adjacent to an enemy hero. Target a unit adjacent to you.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Angry Roar
text:
If enraged, perform the primary action on one of your active cards with an active effect.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Prey Drive
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack: If enraged, and the target was not removed, remove up to 1 enemy minion in radius.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Prey Abundance
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack: If enraged, and the target was not removed, remove up to 1 enemy minion in radius.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Rip
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack: If enraged, gain 1 coin.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Feeding Frenzy
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack: If enraged, and the target was not removed, remove up to 2 enemy minions in radius.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Prowling Brute
text:
If enraged, after movement, you may swap with a unit or a token adjacent to you.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Rampaging Beast
text:
If enraged, after movement, you may swap with a unit or a token adjacent to you; if you do, move up to 1 additional space.

**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Sniff Out
text: If enraged, an enemy hero in range discards a card, if able.

name: Eyes on the Prey
text: If enraged, an enemy hero in range discards a card, if able.

name: Instinctive Reaction
text:

name: Apex Predator
text: If enraged, an enemy hero in range discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Evolutionary Response
text:

name: Unbound Fury
text: You are always enraged, and all your resolved cards count as active.

text:
